ygData.subject: Re: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: i keep invis mem d in case i get messed up and have to rest without getting attacked.  after almost dying to a stupid puma once ive been alot more careful...
ygData.messageBody:
i keep invis mem'd in case i get messed up and have to rest without getting
attacked. after almost dying to a stupid puma once ive been alot more
careful... and going to the zone wall doesnt alway help either. once i was
resting in ec and a griffin went on the wall and ganked me.

belphenor


>From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <mike@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Spells
>Date: Thu, 3 Jun 1999 13:27:30 -0400
>
>Adding more spell slots would completly unbalanced the game, especially at
>higher levels. Basically truth be told you need to learn to manage your
>spells if you guys can't balance them out at 12 or 16 you guys are really
>going to have problems at 29. You really don't need a wide variety of
>spells especially being a necromancer. All you really need are your lifetap
>line of spells and your dots and you can handle anything. Then you throw in
>some goodies like Feign death. I usually keep my shielding spells memorized
>just because I have more room. Once you hit 16 drop gate and put in feign
>death, truthfulluy I don't know why you would get invis memorized because
>once a creature has you in your targeting it doesn't matter if you go
>invis, they still can kill you.
>
>Naeeldar 19 Necromancer
